name: 1010 Shape Puzzle
description:
You can enjoy it anytime, anywhere without network. This offline block puzzle has a very simple gameplay: just drag, drop, and fill up all the grid. But once playing, you will be addicted with this classic brick game

Features :
-A 1010 classic block puzzle game with simple gameplay and easy control
-Fun, colorful and engaging graphics
-Smooth and delicate animation
-Different game mode for challengers
-Hours of fun, extremely exciting to play
